title: Print, "Brocade of Yezo (Yezo-Nishiki), No. 21", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Brocade of Yezo
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 21 / Yezo-Nishiki.
description: A large iris in mottled purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Brocade of Yezo (Yezo-Nishiki), No. 21", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.8 cm (16 1/16 x 10 15/16 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-75.
